message.body: happy monday!
ugh dont remind me
what...that it's Monday
only five more days til the weekend!
ughhhhh
mondays are my least fav. i have class right after work and wont get him til 9 at the earliesy
huh, didnt we go out for 'ritas a few weeks ago?
dont have class every mon
some weeks are 'online'
oooh thats right
so its just THIS monday that sucks balls
how was the weekend?
most mondays actually
gorgeous! busy though. Had a ton of schoolworka dn went to linvilla yesterday. you?
linvilla? wtf is that?
linvilla orchard
wheres that?
media
WTF!
I just got an email from colleen. She says she wrote me a check for bills in june and wants the money back. Seriously?
bahahahaha really?
how much? and when did she move out?
like june 8th
according to her email that is
when she moved out?
im impressed by her audacity lol
so am I, kinda
it's ridiculous though
whoops lost the chat, wehat did you write before that?
me: so am I, kinda it's ridiculous though
I let her keep that car for fucks sake
Im half tempted to ignore her
oh, and shes blocking me on gchat apparently
hahar really?
im not really surprised by that, nor do I care
soo are you going to ignore her?
I mean we recently discussed this money thing
really when?
and how there is no point in adding it all up
I dunno a week ago or so
this is stupid.

she acts like all I care about is money. When she moved in she told me she was willing to help out w/ bills and all. then next thing I know she is like, 'well its not my house, why should I pay bills?'. Really, so you tell that to your landlord when you rent an apartment?
wow
really?
thats crazzyyy
well how much money are we talking?

we both paid for the car, but I put about $3000 into it, and Im not asking for any of that back. She feels that she should live in my house rent free? I don't get it. even if she moved out in june, her stuff was still there until god knows when
haha i know what you mean. I think she feels entitled to be refunded money for a month in which she wasnt living there though. and she obviously isnt taking the car into account
shes being passive-aggressive is what she is doing, and that shit isn't going to fly with me
if anyone owes anyone money it's her, but Im not like that. Im not going to make a big deal about it. I havent even crunched the numbers because it's just not important.
well then jsut ignore her
I kinda want to, but I also want to explain myself. Part of me wants to crunch the numbers and put it in her face, but thats immature and unnecessary.

She has no idea. In my relationship history, I practically gave away a house, I let kari get away with murder when it came to finances, not to mention letting her keep the car also. Why would anyone think im all about the money? Its insanity!
i dont knowww
youre really working youself about it too much though
youre letting her win by getting upset
yeah, that may or may not have been her intention.
I can tell you one thing, its not about the money.
well see

Ill prob just write her back, mention some of these things, tell her that if it's closure she seeks, then she can have it. I will drop off the rest of her things at her parents and never speak to her again, since that is what she wants
is that what she said she wants?
not in those words but she has hinted at ti
welll, wasnt she supposed to come get the rest of her shit like last weekend?
yeah, that never happened. I didnt think it was going to
thats dumb
what did u end up doing this weekend?
hung out w. arica
oh yea? how was that?
ok
she seems to be getting the idea
we talked about it a bit. I told her that I just dont want anything serious, Im not sure how well she gets it, but she claims to be on the same page
okayyy
so no more ring talk?
noooope
she still says stupid stuff every now and again, but whatever
she came by on sat and we had dinner. She left sun morning after breakfast, didnt stick around
i seee
so are you feeling better about it then?
sure, but Im really only interested in her for one reason
ok, more than one, but mainly one
you should be proud that I blew off larah
i am proud. have you heard anythiong from her?
nope
colleen apparently has 'unblocked' me
and has apologized in true colleen fashion about the email she sent
hahaha what did she say?
that she is sorry about the timing and weirdness of the email and that she doesnt feel things were even financially between us and would like more resolve there because its been bothering her lately
